00046         extraParameters = NULL;

00065 /*
00066  * Convert the file.
00067  */
00068 bool CELFileConvertToXDA::ConvertASCIIFile(const char *fileName, const char *newFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options)
00069 {
00070         Clear();
00071 
00072         // Read the input file.
00073         CCELFileData inFile;
00074         inFile.SetFileName(fileName);
00075         if (inFile.Read() == false)
00076         {
00077                 errorCode = UnableToOpenCelFile;
00078                 return false;
00079         }
00080 
00081 
00082         // Copy the input file object to the output file object.
00083         CCELFileWriter outFile;
00084         outFile.SetFileName(newFile);
00085         outFile.SetFileFormat(CCELFileData::XDA_BCEL);
00086         if(!CELConversionUtilities::Copy(inFile, outFile, options))
00087     {
00088         return false;
00089     }
00090 
00091 
00092         // Write the output file.
00093         if (outFile.WriteXDABCel() == false)
00094         {
00095                 errorCode = UnableToWriteTheFile;
00096                 return false;
00097         }
00098 
00099         return true;
00100 }
00101 
00102 /*
00103  * Convert the file.
00104  */
00105 bool CELFileConvertToXDA::ConvertCalvinFile(const char *fileName, const char *newFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options)
00106 {
00107         Clear();
00108 
00109         // Read the input file.
00110         CelFileData inFile;
00111         CelFileReader reader;
00112         reader.SetFilename(fileName);
00113         try
00114         {
00115                 reader.Read(inFile);
00116         }
00117         catch (...)
00118         {
00119                 errorCode = UnableToOpenCelFile;
00120                 return false;
00121         }
00122 
00123         // Copy the input file object to the output file object.
00124         CCELFileWriter outFile;
00125         outFile.SetFileName(newFile);
00126         outFile.SetFileFormat(CCELFileData::XDA_BCEL);
00127         if(!CELConversionUtilities::Copy(inFile, outFile, options))
00128     {
00129         return false;
00130     }
00131 
00132         // Override chip type if it was set in extra parameters
00133         std::string chipType = GetChipTypeFromExtraParameters();
00134         if (chipType.length() > 0)
00135         {
00136                 outFile.SetChipType(chipType.c_str());
00137         }
00138 
00139         // Write the output file.
00140         if (outFile.WriteXDABCel() == false)
00141         {
00142                 errorCode = UnableToWriteTheFile;
00143                 return false;
00144         }
00145 
00146         return true;
00147 }
00148 
00149 std::string CELFileConvertToXDA::GetChipTypeFromExtraParameters()
00150 {
00151         std::string arrayType;
00152         if (extraParameters != NULL && extraParameters->size() > 0)
00153         {
00154                 for (ParameterNameValueTypeVector::const_iterator ii = extraParameters->begin(); ii != extraParameters->end(); ++ii)
00155                 {
00156                         if (ii->GetName() == ARRAY_TYPE_PARAM_NAME)
00157                         {
00158                                 arrayType = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ii->GetValueText());
00159                                 break;
00160                         }
00161                 }
00162         }
00163         return arrayType;
00164 }
